mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rating ( movie_id, user_id, rating, comment) VALUES ( #{movieId}, #{userId}, #{rating}, #{comment})
mapper.select: SELECT rating, COUNT(*) AS count FROM rating WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY rating

SELECT DISTINCT movie_genres.genres_id, genres.name_zh AS genres_name_zh, count(*) AS count, AVG(rating) as avg_rating FROM rating, movie_genres, genres WHERE rating.user_id = #{userId} AND rating.movie_id = movie_genres.movie_id AND movie_genres.genres_id = genres.genres_id GROUP BY movie_genres.genres_id ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT DISTINCT movie_genres.genres_id, count(*) AS count, AVG(rating) as avg_rating FROM rating, movie_genres WHERE rating.user_id = #{userId} AND rating.movie_id = movie_genres.movie_id GROUP BY movie_genres.genres_id ORDER BY count DESC
